```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# 
tb_theme1 <- function(matrix){
  tb <- matrix %>%
    gt(
      rownames_to_stub = TRUE
    ) %>%
    opt_align_table_header(align = "left") %>%
    tab_spanner(
      label = "Sites"
      # columns = c(-Total)
    ) %>%
    opt_stylize(style = 6, color = 'gray') %>%
    tab_style(
      style = list(
        cell_fill(color = "#317773"),
        cell_text(weight = "bold"),
        cell_text(v_align = "middle"),
        cell_text(color = "white", size = px(18))
      ),
      locations = list(
        cells_title()
      )
    ) %>%
    tab_style(
      style = list(
        cell_fill(color = "#E2D1F9"),
        cell_text(color = "black", size = px(18)),
        cell_text(v_align = "middle")
      ),
      locations = list(
        cells_stubhead(),
        cells_column_spanners(),
        cells_column_labels()
      )
    ) %>%
    tab_style(
      style = list(
        cell_fill(color = "#F0F0F0"),
        cell_text(v_align = "middle", size = px(18))
      ),
      locations = list(
        cells_stub()
      )
    ) %>%
    tab_style(
      style = list(
        cell_text(align = "center", size = px(18))
      ),
      locations = list(
        cells_column_labels(columns = everything())
      )
    ) %>%
    tab_style(
      style = list(
        cell_text(align = "center", size = px(18))
      ),
      locations = list(
        cells_body(columns = everything())
      )
    ) %>%
    fmt_markdown(columns = everything()) %>%
    tab_options(table.width = pct(100)) %>%
    cols_width(1 ~ px(300))
}
 

# Function to extract and format legend horizontally
g_legend <- function(p) {
  tmp <- ggplot_gtable(ggplot_build(p))
  leg <- which(sapply(tmp$grobs, function(x) x$name) == "guide-box")
  legend_gtable <- tmp$grobs[[leg]]
  
  # Arrange legend components horizontally
  legend_gtable$widths <- unit(rep(1, ncol(legend_gtable)), "null")
  legend_gtable$grobs <- legend_gtable$grobs[order(legend_gtable$layout$l)]
  
  return(legend_gtable)
}
```

## 1. Summary

**Denominator:** All enrolled women who have had a pregnancy outcome and had a singleton pregnancy.<br>
                 Removed women who had a Gestational age outside of 0-42 weeks.<br>
                 Removed women who had a GWG of >50kg or <-10 kg at their last visit from enrollment.

```{r}

matoutcomes_combined_iom <- bind_rows(mat_outcomes_table_iom) %>% 
  select("Total", "0", "1", "2")


matoutcomes_combined_iom <- matoutcomes_combined_iom %>%
  select(Total, `0`, `1`, `2`) %>%
  rename(
    "Insufficient GWG"  = `0`,
    "Adequate GWG" = `1`,
    "Excessive GWG" = `2`)

matoutcomes_output_iom <-  matoutcomes_combined_iom %>%
  select(-Total)

# replace NA with 0s (this likely means there is not yet data)
matoutcomes_combined_iom[is.na(matoutcomes_combined_iom)] <- paste0("0 (0)")

matoutcomes_output_iom <- tb_theme1(matoutcomes_combined_iom) %>%
 tab_header(
    title = md("**Table 5. Summary of maternal outcomes based on IOM standards.**")
```

### Table 8. Summary of demographics by IOM adequacy
```{r}
demooutcomes_combined_iom <- bind_rows(demo_outcomes_table_iom) %>% 
  select("Total", "0", "1", "2")


demooutcomes_combined_iom <- demooutcomes_combined_iom %>%
  select(Total, `0`, `1`, `2`) %>%
  rename(
    "Insufficient GWG"  = `0`,
    "Adequate GWG" = `1`,
    "Excessive GWG" = `2`)

demooutcomes_output_iom <-  demooutcomes_combined_iom %>%
  select(-Total)

# replace NA with 0s (this likely means there is not yet data)
demooutcomes_combined_iom[is.na(demooutcomes_combined_iom)] <- paste0("0 (0)")

demooutcomes_output_iom <- tb_theme1(demooutcomes_combined_iom) %>%
 tab_header(
    title = md("**Table 8. Summary of demographics based on IOM standards.**")
```

```{r}
          paste0(round(median(num_miscarriage, na.rm = TRUE)),
                 " (", format(IQR(num_miscarriage, na.rm=TRUE), digits=1, nsmall=1),")"),
    "Primigravida, n (%)" = paste0(
      format(sum(primigravida == 1  , na.rm = TRUE), nsmall = 0, digits = 2),
      " (",
      format(round(sum(primigravida == 1  , na.rm = TRUE)/ dim(gwg_inf)[1]*100, 2), nsmall = 0, digits = 2),
      ")")
    ) %>%
        t() %>%
        as.data.frame() %>%
      `colnames<-`(c(.[1,])) %>% unlist()
)

    
```

```{r warning=FALSE, fig.height = 6}
  geom_smooth(method = "loess",

  ylim(-10, 50) +
```
